SQLDataSource.Author: IFS RnD
SQLDataSource.Name: IND_SHIPMENT_MANAGEMENT_SEND_DIRECT_DELIVERY_MESSAGE_FOR_SHIPMENTS
SQLDataSource.Where: ('$COMPANY$' IS NULL OR(NVL(&AO.COMPANY_SITE_API.GET_COMPANY(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_CONTRACT(shipment_id)), '%') = '$COMPANY$')) AND ('$SITE$' IS NULL OR (NVL(contract, '%') = '$SITE$')) AND ('$STATUS$' IS NULL OR (NVL(&AO.Shipment_API.Finite_State_Decode__(objstate), 'N/A') = '$STATUS$')) AND ('$RECEIVER_ID$' IS NULL OR (NVL(receiver_id, '%') = '$RECEIVER_ID$')) AND ('$NEXT_STEP$' IS NULL OR (NVL(NVL(&AO.Shipment_Flow_API.Get_Next_Step(shipment_id), 'N/A'), '%') = '$NEXT_STEP$')) AND ('$SHIPMENT_TYPE$' IS NULL OR (NVL(shipment_type, '%') = '$SHIPMENT_TYPE$')) AND ('$FORWARDER$' IS NULL OR (NVL(forward_agent_id, 'N/A') = '$FORWARDER$')) AND ('$ROUTE$' IS NULL OR (NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_ROUTE_ID(shipment_id), 'N/A') = '$ROUTE$')) AND ('$DELIVERY_TERMS$' IS NULL OR (NVL(delivery_terms, 'N/A') = '$DELIVERY_TERMS$')) AND ('$SHIP_VIA$' IS NULL OR (NVL(ship_via_code, 'N/A') = '$SHIP_VIA$')) AND ('$SHIPMENT_ID$' IS NULL OR (shipment_id = '$SHIPMENT_ID$')) AND ('$CONSOLIDATED_SHIPMENT_ID$' IS NULL OR (NVL(TO_CHAR(parent_consol_shipment_id), 'N/A') = '$CONSOLIDATED_SHIPMENT_ID$'))
